name: Sloppy Runnin
description:
I made this game in 1 1/2  days because i didnt have much time to really develop the game, i was thinking about adding a slow-motion effect and a dashing ability. Sadly tho there was no time left to implement that. See this Project as a Prototype for what it could have been. I hope u had great fun with the Game and didnt hate every part of it :D

(Oh btw this is my first ever Game-Jam submisson I would be greatful for feedback)
